title: Bias
desc:
Target a player, he gains the Biased (N) Status. You gain the Biased (P) Status. All cards that are in all players hands gain the card attribute Biased. Abb. -b
Biased cards apply all negative effects targeting Biased (P) to Biased (N). Biased cards apply all positive effects targeting Biased (N) to Biased (P).
